attributes.action: Consider scrapping Employers National Insurance Contributions as they appear to have no benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every week, employers have to pay approximately £20 per week to employee somebody. When asked what we get for our money, neither the Inland Revenue or the National Insurance Contributions Agency can answer. THIS IS ANOTHER STEALTH TAX COSTING INDUSTRIES THOUSANDS PER YEAR. Lets look at scrapping Employers NI and put more money back into running business.
